channel.title: New restarter?
channel.description: Hi, I would like to have a restarter that pings my server every few minutes to test to see if it is up, and if not, it will reset this. Unfortunately I cannot make this myself at the time, so any help will be appreciated :) Idea taken from http://thedailywtf.com/Articles/ITAPPMONROBOT.aspx Thanks Justis

item.title: New restarter?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Hi,
I would like to have a restarter that pings my server every few minutes to test to see if it is up, and if not, it will reset this. Unfortunately I cannot make this myself at the time, so any help will be appreciated Idea taken from http://thedailywtf.com/Articles/ITAPPMONROBOT.aspx
Thanks
Justis
